clean_data: Support Specialist II Support Specialist II Phoenix AZ Hardworking dedicated and success driven individual who continually demonstrates initiative and ingenuity is seeking a challenging technical position with growth potential the ideal position will provide an opportunity to utilize customer service experience technical training and business knowledge while providing your organization with creative problem solving multitasking and excellent productivity Work Experience Support Specialist II American Technology Specialists Tempe AZ April 2018 to Present I provide daily
